name: console.log('Vitor Hugo Salgado')
body:
##about me
Hi, I'm Vitor, a software developer living in Sao Paulo who came from beach direct into the "concrete jungle". I'm specialized in web applications using mainly c#, asp.net. javascript.
Currently i'm focusing on learning multiple programming languages and platforms like Node JS, Java and soon Ruby :).

##things I like
Coffee, coffee and maybe some more coffee...:), beach, travels, bike, movies, code..

##some of my future plans
Travel as much as possible, learn english and maybe spanish, practice more sports..

##some of my code around
[Fatec Mobile](http://vitorsalgado.github.io/fatec-mobile/) / [Jedi BOT](http://vitorsalgado.github.io/jedi-robot/) / [Terminal](https://github.com/vitorsalgado/fatec-terminal) / [CarExp](https://github.com/vitorsalgado/carExp)

[My Github](http://github.com/vtrsalgado)

##stay in touch
* [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/vtrsalgado)
* [LinkedIn](http://br.linkedin.com/in/vitorsalgado/)
* [Github](http://github.com/vitorsalgado)

##contact
* Phone > +55 13 99793 8721
* Email > vsalgadopb@gmail.com
* Skype > vitor.salgado@outlook.com

(the title is too nerd, i know..)
